title: Ryan Reynolds steps out with Inez as it is revealed he and Blake Lively have welcomed a third child
text:
Ryan Reynolds was seen enjoying a daddy-daughter outing with his three-year-old daughter Inez in New York this Friday.

The 42-year-old movie star was stylishly casual in a cream button-up shirt and a pair of dark jeans.

News broke that same day that Ryan and his wife Blake Lively reportedly welcomed their third child into the world roughly two months ago.

Time together: Come Friday, it was back to daddy duty for Ryan, who was joined by daughter Inez, four, while out in Manhattan

In addition to Inez, Ryan and Blake also share a four-year-old son called James.

An Us Weekly source revealed on Friday that the couple's new baby is 'about two months old.'

Blake gave her baby bump its public debut in May when she attended the premiere of Ryan's new movie Pokemon Detective Pikachu.

On Thursday, Ryan shared a selfie from a date night out with Blake.

Proud papa: News broke that same day that Ryan and his wife Blake Lively reportedly welcomed their third child into the world roughly two months ago

The actor's snap was a little bit sweet, a little bit sassy as he managed to look great in the photo, while his wife was caught off guard.

Ryan, 42, looked handsome in a navy polo and black-rimmed glasses.

Blake, 32, was styled in a striped ensemble, which she accessorized with a gold chain necklace, rings and earrings.

Ryan Reynolds, 42, took to Instagram Stories on Thursday night to share a selfie from his date night with Blake Lively, 32

The stunning blonde wore her long hair down and tousled. Her make-up featured a natural glam look.

The couple are notorious for playfully trolling one another.

On each other's birthdays, Blake and Ryan often posts unflattering photos of the other, with hilarious commentary to boot.

Smile and wave: Blake gave her baby bump its public debut in May when she attended the premiere of Ryan's new movie Pokemon Detective Pikachu

In August, Ryan shared a collage of hilarious photos of his gorgeous wife, seemingly caught off guard.

'Happy Birthday, @blakelively,' he wrote.

Ryan wed Blake in September 2012, after having met in 2010 on set of Green Lantern.

Prior to their union, Ryan was wed to Scarlett Johansson, from September 2008 until July 2011.
description: News broke that same day that Ryan and his wife Blake Lively reportedly welcomed their third child into the world roughly two months ago.
